title: The Ten Laws for Personal Success
headline: Ten simple changes you can make in your everyday life to feel more fulfilled and enhance your personal success.
description: Have you ever wondered what ‘personal success’ means to you? Identifying what ‘success’ looks like is the first step to building your brand and focusing on what is important to you. Be introduced to the 10 self-improvement laws that will lead to success by enrolling in this free course. By managing the food and media you consume, the clutter in your house and the daily habits that dictate your actions, your life will be enriched and bettered.
courseDescription:
What does personal success look like in your life? By learning how to manage your life effectively, you can achieve that level of personal success. In this course, you will learn about 10 self-improvement laws developed by a personal development expert. One tool that you will study is the Selfie Speak Programming (SSP) model, which reinforces positive human behaviour and daily habits to help you manage your time and achieve your goals. You will learn the method of establishing constructive daily habits using your cell phone's memo app. Are you familiar with audio production and creating your own clips? This course takes you through tips and tricks to help you create audio files for your ears only. You will also learn how to define what ‘personal success’ means to you. The lessons you study throughout this course will then have a more impactful effect on your life.

You will take a deep dive into everything that you consume throughout the day, from entertainment and news to food and beverages. See how you should manage your intake of TV and social media news, while also covering how to spend your time once you cut out the ‘bad’ content. Learn how the food industry is making it harder to live a healthy life, especially when you dine in a restaurant. Boost your health by studying how to shop for one-ingredient (or whole) foods, avoiding advertisements for junk food and drinking water. You will also study other forms of personal health, including the ways to get a good night's rest, the best methods of exercise for boosting creativity and the importance of meditation and yoga. Are you comfortable with inviting guests over to your home? You will learn how you can organize your house - and mind - to avoid unnecessary clutter.

As you progress through the material, you will be introduced to the basics of forming lasting relationships with your friends and family - and see how your cellphone can cause a rift in your social life. You will also learn about wealth and the difference between being ‘rich’ and being ‘successful’. More importantly, various methods of managing your money will be explained. Avoiding retirement and cementing your legacy will be discussed, too. This course finishes with a comprehensive look into creativity and different methods that you can use on a daily basis to boost the quality of your ideas. Throughout this course, you will form a solid understanding of how to achieve personal success by taking a hard look at your physical and mental health, and the outside factors that can negatively affect you. Enrol today to learn how you can immediately start to use these simple self-improvement laws for your own personal success.
